folder.name: Global Functions
folder.tiptext: Functions that can be added to your script

action.name: onClipEvent
action.tiptext: Performs actions when a particular movie clip event occurs

action.name: on
action.tiptext: Performs actions when a particular mouse event occurs

action.name: setProperty
action.tiptext: Set a property of a movie clip

action.name: duplicateMovieClip
action.tiptext: Make a duplicate of a movie clip

action.name: removeMovieClip
action.tiptext: Removes a movie clip created with duplicateMovieClip

action.name: startDrag
action.tiptext: Start a drag operation on a movie clip
action.text: startDrag(% target, lockcenter, l, t, r, b %);\n

action.name: stopDrag
action.tiptext: Stops a drag operation currently in progress

string.name: getProperty
string.tiptext: Returns a property of the specified movie clip

string.name: targetPath
string.tiptext: Returns the target path string for a specified movie clip

folder.name: MovieClip
folder.tiptext: Class that represents a movie clip

string.name: attachMovie
string.tiptext: Creates instance of movie clip located in the Library

string.name: createEmptyMovieClip
string.tiptext: Creates an empty Movie Clip instance

string.name: createTextField
string.tiptext: Creates an empty text field in this movie clip
string.text: .createTextField(% instanceName="", depth, x, y, width, height %)

string.name: duplicateMovieClip
string.tiptext: Duplicates this movie clip

string.name: getBounds
string.tiptext: Returns an object whose properties contain the bounds of the movie clip

string.name: getBytesLoaded
string.tiptext: Returns the number of bytes loaded for this movie clip

string.name: getBytesTotal
string.tiptext: Returns the size of the movie clip

string.name: getDepth
string.tiptext: Returns the absolute "z" order of the movie clip

string.name: getInstanceAtDepth
string.tiptext: Returns the movie clip instance found at the specified depth.

string.name: getNextHighestDepth
string.tiptext: Returns the next highest "z" order depth available

string.name: getSWFVersion
string.tiptext: Returns the version of the movie clip

string.name: getURL
string.tiptext: Navigates to an URL, optionally sending variables

string.name: globalToLocal
string.tiptext: Converts stage coordinate to movie clip coordinate

string.name: gotoAndPlay
string.tiptext: Go to a frame of movie clip and start playing

string.name: gotoAndStop
string.tiptext: Go to a frame of movie clip and stop

string.name: hitTest
string.tiptext: Check if a point or movie clip intersects another movie clip

string.name: loadMovie
string.tiptext: Loads a SWF or JPEG from an URL into movie clip

string.name: loadVariables
string.tiptext: Loads variables from an URL into movie clip

string.name: localToGlobal
string.tiptext: Converts movie clip coordinate to stage coordinate

string.name: nextFrame
string.tiptext: Go to next frame of movie clip

string.name: play
string.tiptext: Starts playing movie clip from current frame

string.name: prevFrame
string.tiptext: Go to previous frame of movie clip

string.name: removeMovieClip
string.tiptext: Removes movie clip created with duplicateMovieClip

string.name: setMask
string.tiptext: Sets the scriptable mask of this movie clip

string.name: startDrag
string.tiptext: Starts drag operation on movie clip

string.name: stop
string.tiptext: Stops playing movie clip

string.name: stopDrag
string.tiptext: Stops drag operation

string.name: swapDepths
string.tiptext: Swaps the "z" order of 2 Movie Clips

string.name: unloadMovie
string.tiptext: Unloads .swf previously loaded with loadMovie

string.name: enabled
string.tiptext: If true, button movie clip is enabled; if false, disabled

string.name: focusEnabled
string.tiptext: If true, movie clip may receive the focus

string.name: hitArea
string.tiptext: Hit Area to use for Button Movie Clips

string.name: tabIndex
string.tiptext: Tab index of a MovieClip object

string.name: tabEnabled
string.tiptext: If true, tab stop enabled; if false, disabled

string.name: tabChildren
string.tiptext: If true, children may be tab stops

string.name: trackAsMenu
string.tiptext: Track as Menu Item for Button Movie Clips

string.name: _x
string.tiptext: X position of the movie clip

string.name: _y
string.tiptext: Y position of the movie clip

string.name: _xmouse
string.tiptext: X position of the mouse

string.name: _ymouse
string.tiptext: Y position of the mouse

string.name: _xscale
string.tiptext: X scale factor of the movie clip (percentage)

string.name: _yscale
string.tiptext: Y scale factor of the movie clip (percentage)

string.name: _width
string.tiptext: Width of the movie clip

string.name: _height
string.tiptext: Height of the movie clip

string.name: _alpha
string.tiptext: Alpha transparency of the movie clip (percentage)

string.name: _visible
string.tiptext: Returns true if movie clip is visible, false if hidden

string.name: _target
string.tiptext: Target path of the movie clip

string.name: _rotation
string.tiptext: Angle of rotation of the movie clip (degrees)

string.name: _name
string.tiptext: Instance name of the movie clip

string.name: _framesloaded
string.tiptext: Number of frames already loaded in the movie clip

string.name: _droptarget
string.tiptext: During drag, movie clip the dragged movie clip is over

string.name: _currentframe
string.tiptext: Current frame of the movie clip

string.name: _totalframes
string.tiptext: Total number of frames in the movie clip

string.name: _focusrect
string.tiptext: Returns false if tab focus rectangles are hidden, true if displayed

string.name: _url
string.tiptext: URL the movie clip was loaded from

string.name: _parent
string.tiptext: The parent Movie Clip of the current Movie Clip

string.name: _lockroot
string.tiptext: Forces references to _root in this clip or its children to resolve to this clip

string.name: _quality
string.tiptext: Sets or retrieves the rendering quality used for a SWF file

string.name: _soundbuftime
string.tiptext: Specifies the number of seconds a sound prebuffers before it starts to stream

string.name: beginFill
string.tiptext: Identifies the beginning of a solid fill

string.name: beginGradientFill
string.tiptext: Identifies the beginning of a gradient fill

string.name: lineStyle
string.tiptext: Changes the current line style

string.name: moveTo
string.tiptext: Moves the current drawing position

string.name: lineTo
string.tiptext: Draws a line from the current drawing position

string.name: curveTo
string.tiptext: Draws a curve from the current drawing position

string.name: endFill
string.tiptext: Identifies the end of a fill

string.name: clear
string.tiptext: Clears all drawing commands on Movie Clip

string.name: onPress
string.tiptext: Invoked when press event occurs

string.name: onRelease
string.tiptext: Invoked when release event occurs

string.name: onReleaseOutside
string.tiptext: Invoked when releaseOutside event occurs

string.name: onRollOver
string.tiptext: Invoked when rollOver event occurs

string.name: onRollOut
string.tiptext: Invoked when rollOut event occurs

string.name: onDragOver
string.tiptext: Invoked when dragOver event occurs

string.name: onDragOut
string.tiptext: Invoked when dragOut event occurs

string.name: onLoad
string.tiptext: Invoked when load event occurs

string.name: onUnload
string.tiptext: Invoked when unload event occurs

string.name: onEnterFrame
string.tiptext: Invoked when frame is entered

string.name: onMouseDown
string.tiptext: Invoked when mouseDown event occurs

string.name: onMouseUp
string.tiptext: Invoked when mouseUp event occurs

string.name: onMouseMove
string.tiptext: Invoked when mouseMove event occurs

string.name: onKeyDown
string.tiptext: Invoked when keyDown event occurs

string.name: onKeyUp
string.tiptext: Invoked when keyUp event occurs

string.name: onData
string.tiptext: Invoked when data event occurs

string.name: onSetFocus
string.tiptext: Invoked when movie clip receives focus

string.name: onKillFocus
string.tiptext: Invoked when movie clip loses focus
